info.title: Navigate forwards to a tab list

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeTablist
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the tab list
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the tab list
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Navigate to the tab list. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Right Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the tab list.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the tab list. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Right Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the tab list.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name of the tab list, 'Entertainment', is conveyed
Role of the selected item, 'tab', is conveyed
Name of the focused tab, 'Nils Frahm', is conveyed
State of the focused tab, 'selected', is conveyed
Position of the focused tab, 1, is conveyed
Number of tabs in the tab list, 3, is conveyed
